alert.note: Alert for Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 12:56AM CDT until May 09 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN CAMERON COUNTY... At 1255 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Garden Park Elementary School, or over Downtown Brownsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Los Fresnos, South Padre Island, Rancho Viejo, Los Indios, Southmost, Olmito, Port Of Brownsville, La Paloma, Cameron Park and Downtown Brownsville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
